mapper.sql: sys_menu.id AS sys_menu_id, sys_menu.name AS sys_menu_name, sys_menu.status AS sys_menu_status, sys_menu.sort AS sys_menu_sort, sys_menu.path AS sys_menu_path, sys_menu.parent_id AS sys_menu_parent_id, sys_menu.create_by AS sys_menu_create_by, sys_menu.create_time AS sys_menu_create_time
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT , sru.role_id as role_id FROM sys_role_user sru JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sru.role_id = srm.role_id AND sru.user_id = #{userId} JOIN sys_menu sys_menu ON srm.menu_id = sys_menu.id WHERE sys_menu.parent_id is null order by sys_menu.sort
SELECT , sru.role_id as role_id FROM sys_role_menu srm JOIN sys_menu sys_menu ON srm.menu_id = sys_menu.id and srm.role_id = #{roleId} WHERE sys_menu.parent_id is null

SELECT , null as role_id FROM sys_menu sys_menu WHERE sys_menu.parent_id is null
and sys_menu.name like concat('%',#{name}, '%')
